meanings.definition: A device that automatically signs a person's name.
meanings.sent1: The autopens quickly signed the documents for the busy CEO.
meanings.sent2: The autopens on the desk made signing papers much faster.
meanings.sent3: The autopens decided to have a signing race just for fun.
meanings.sent4: The autopens worked tirelessly, like a team of dedicated assistants.
meanings.sent5: The autopens hummed as they efficiently signed each paper.

meanings.definition: To sign one's name automatically using a machine.
meanings.sent1: She autopens her signature on all the letters before sending them out.
meanings.sent2: He autopens the checks to save time during the busy season.
meanings.sent3: The machine autopens with precision, never missing a beat.
meanings.sent4: Her hand autopens the cards, but her heart adds a personal touch.
meanings.sent5: The robot autopens with mechanical precision, never faltering.
